Rent conditions

We value each client and provide high-quality car-sharing service in the city.

In order to make it pleasant and safe for you to use our service on an ongoing basis, we have identified several conditions in order to take a car to rent

Download App

  • 01

    Driving experience from 2 years

    To rent the auto, you neet to registrate your driver card in our office

  • 02

    Only for the city

    Our cars are used only in the city. Sorry, but you can not leave the borders of the city

  • 03

    Mobile telephone and internet

    To use our service, you need have mobile telephone and internet. Booking and paying are online
